subdisciplines.name: Medical Ecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationships between human health and the environment, including cultural and political-economic factors.

subdisciplines.name: Global Health
subdisciplines.description: The study of health issues that transcend national boundaries, including the social, cultural, political, and economic factors that shape health outcomes.

subdisciplines.name: Psychological Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between culture and human psychology, including mental health, illness, and healing practices.
